TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It drains all the resources and atmosphere left here on Earth to terraform one planet. And you cannot move humanity in the process - they would all die.

I wish for a personal orchestra to follow me around during the day and make my life epic.

Granted, but the ochestra is full of axe murders.

I wish today wasn't my English exam.

Granted, it was yesterday and you missed it.

I wish for my fridge to be always full.
Granted, but you can't get to the stuff at the back. They rot and smell up the entire house.

You get a duck instead of nothing.

i wish I wasn't broke

granted. you have so much money that you bank account runs out of bits and you're back where you started.

i wish that it's 12:40. (it's 12:28 right now)

granted. it is ALWAYS 12:40 and you have a perpetual feeling of hunger due to it being lunchtime

i wish for a sanvich

1 min late

granted, its mine and i take it back.

Granted you get nothing

i wish I was Jeb and I could re spawn as he does

Granted. You also get stuck in Jool orbit for 20 years, slowly driven mad by the egg of the Kraken.

I wish for version 0.50.

Granted, hard drive it's stored on spontaneously combusts.

I wish for a government-paid Skylon.

Granted. You are not selected on the mission.

I wish for a 3d printer that can print living kerbonauts.

Granted. They are like the teleporters from Doom, were the souls of demons go into the body of the Kerbonauts, both giving them life but making them possesed and dangerous.

I wish for a 3d printer that can print everything on Shapeways for free! (I'm broke )

Granted. When it's 4D masters get word of it's whereabouts, you are attacked.

I wish for a .5 liter canister of bossness. Don's ask me what for, and don't worry about my safety. I've got enough to counteract and harmful effects.

You get it but jacksepticeye steals it back

i wish for Google to work

Granted, Google is a person who works in an office, but who's also a freelance hacker who hacked Google.com.

I wish to score a hit on the WOW counter.

Granted. Everyone hates you for getting a hit when no one else had.

I wish for money.
Granted mi6 thinks your a major league hacker and takes you out

ERROR WISH NOT FOUND NEUTRALIZE SUBJECT!!!

I wish everybody's equally equal.

Granted the world is now communist

i wish wish for a Ã­Â Â½Ã­Â¹Ë†

- - - Updated - - -

Why does it not show up I downloaded it my computer

Granted, you receive 6 ?s and exchange six fingers for it so the ?s can replace the lost fingers.

I wish Kolechia no longer come to border.

Granted. You lose your job after letting in an immigrant from Cobrastan.

I wish for a pair of glasses.

granted. they're made of air.

i wish for a NaNifyer

Granted. It breaks.

I wish for a Swiss Army Knife.

granted. it's dull and made of adamantium so you cant't sharpen it.

I wish i had a roll of gaffer tape.

(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaffer_tape)
